attributes.action: Give added consideration and support to students taking exams in 2023.
attributes.additional_details: I want the government or parliament to do it as these are the only people that can make it happen. Without the government or Parliament these changes would never happen as they have the most power over this topic.
attributes.background: As current year 11 students learning has been effected a lot due to the Corona virus over the past couple years, causing a lot of our GCSE learning to be effected I personally think extra help should be given to us.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619538
